results.content:
Very in dept course targeting that you build a solid ground in your web programming career. It is full of unique explanations that go down to the protocol specifications at the bottom of the layer so that you can make sense of the words you don't understand while reading the API references of these technologies at the top.

The instructor is very energetic and energizing man he is very sympathetic, answers your questions as soon as possible, prepares his lessons with great passion and joy, it is obvious that he enjoys his work very much. Currently one of my favorite instructors on Udemy. I am sure he will appeal to a much larger audience in a very short time.

This is my 3rd course with you, I'm having a great time, thank you Clyde. You always deserve 5 stars.

response.content: You've made my day Ahmet. Thank you for the kind words and feedback. This course took me over 12 months (yep, you read that correctly) to put together, so it's so encouraging to know that it is helping you. My job is done :)

response.content: Thanks for the feedback Luca. I see that you have only just started my course (you have only just completed a few percent of the course content), and if you continue you'll see that we do cover validation of input in a lot of detail. I also show you how to use AJAX with pure JavaScript (jQuery is a library for JavaScript). Thanks again for the input and keep coding :)
